Uses of Package
org.cleverbus.api.event

Packages that use org.cleverbus.api.event
org.cleverbus.api.event Defines CleverBus events. 
org.cleverbus.core.common.event Defines CleverBus events. 
org.cleverbus.core.reqres Requests/responses saving. 
 

Classes in org.cleverbus.api.event used by org.cleverbus.api.event
AbstractAsynchEvent
          Base class for asynchronous message events.
 

Classes in org.cleverbus.api.event used by org.cleverbus.core.common.event
AbstractAsynchEvent
          Base class for asynchronous message events.
CompletedMsgAsynchEvent
          Event for successfully completed message, i.e. the message is in MsgStateEnum.OK state.
FailedMsgAsynchEvent
          Event for failed message, i.e. the message is in MsgStateEnum.FAILED state.
PartlyFailedMsgAsynchEvent
          Event for partly failed message, i.e. the message is in MsgStateEnum.PARTLY_FAILED state.
PostponedMsgAsynchEvent
          Event for postponed message, i.e. the message is in MsgStateEnum.POSTPONED state.
ProcessingMsgAsynchEvent
          Event for processing message, i.e. the message is in MsgStateEnum.PROCESSING state.
WaitingMsgAsynchEvent
          Event for waiting message, i.e. the message is in MsgStateEnum.WAITING state.
 

Classes in org.cleverbus.api.event used by org.cleverbus.core.reqres
EventNotifier
          Indicates that an annotated class is a Camel {@link org.apache.camel.spi.EventNotifier event notifier class.
EventNotifierBase
          Base class for implementing Camel event notifiers.
